title: Major changes in v2.42.4
content:
Hi there,

Along with a few minor feature changes, this version contains a much bigger underlying change I've made to the app: migrating to a new version of the programming language.

This is a very high-risk migration and might cause major bugs to the app. As a solo developer, I cannot test everything thoroughly in Pixquare, so if you encounter any critical bugs, please let me know via email or Discord.

I really appreciate it and hope you'll understand if the potential bugs create any inconvenience for you.

Thank you
